headerText.description: Header text for the credential section
headerText.instructions:
Act as a marketing strategist. Write a short title that emphasizes the guarantee that we offer. Alternatively, use one of the company certifications or awards. Avoid the use of the same keywords twice. Max 4 to 5 words. 
 Example to follow: 
 A service you can trust.
 Proud to be Osha certified.
 Sparkling Results Guaranteed
 Happy Guarantee
 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

headerSubText.instructions:
Act as a marketing strategist. Write a short paragraph (2 to 3 sentences) about our guarantee, certification, or awards. Avoid the use of the same keywords twice. Do not use the third person, but use the second-person pronoun.
